header.description: NOSSAS helps individuals, collectives and organizations in their struggle for rights and better public policies. We share opportunities for action, methodologies and tools for creating impactful mobilizations. Explore our platform for activists and push your movement with us!

sustainability.description: NOSSAS is funded by donations from individuals and foundations which believe in our work and the impact we wish to have on the world. The organization does not accept money from political parties, public utilities or private companies, and our accounts are audited every year by independent professionals. Here's how to donate!
